thread.title: Greece closes in on third bailout
thread.title_full: Greece closes in on third bailout

title: Greece closes in on third bailout
text:
Greece closes in on third bailout 10 August 2015 Save 
Greece is inching towards sealing a deal for a third financial bailout from its creditors in a move that would end months of financial uncertainty. 
The rescue package worth around £61 billion would be handed over on the condition that Greece enacts a series of reforms. 
Greece is due to make a payment of around £2.1 billion to the European Central Bank on August 20. 
A Greek delegate at the talks told Sky News : “From 12 midnight the two sides started the final stretch - combing through the final text, sentence by sentence, word by word.” 
Last month Thomas Cook said holidaymakers’ uncertainty over Greece had hurt the lates market. Rival Tui Group is due to report its third quarter financial results later this week.
